attributes.title: Worst app I have ever downloaded
He Tried His Hardestest.
attributes.review: This app is so terrible that it made Ivan the Terrible look not so terrible. At first I was skeptical of the reviews claiming that it took 1-2 days for the app to download and here I am two days after the initial download date with the app fully download (finally). The progress was so slow I thought it was the Civil Rights Movement. As I open the app, it asked me for my mobile number and I got a call at exactly 4:20 pm with a representative asking about my availability and schedule. The representative asked me whether I was interested in a slumber party hosted by the President himself and asked me a couple questions ranging from my gender to my age to my race. I ended up not being qualified to go as the representative disclosed the fact that the slumber party is exclusively for girls who are under the age of 15. Weird but that’s the leader of America for you. Then things really got weird. A flock of pigeons landed right outside my window and watched me (they’re watching me as my shaking fingers type this review). Then I decided to watch some TV but my channels where all filled with erotic images of our beloved president doing the nasty with the leader of North Korea. I also received a pamphlet from the Vice President today which read, “I’m watching you.” Scared out of my wits, I turned the page and found a picture of cartoon Jesus staring back at me with the caption, “God is always watching.” Anyway, the performance of this app was definitely not worth the two day wait.

attributes.title: stay safe‼️ this app is NOT what it seems‼️
attributes.review: so, as you all may know, i’m a huge fan of donald trump 🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸 being a part of the trump cult is my only personality trait 🤩 (racists, homophobes, and misogynists are my people 😇) as soon as i saw this app in the app store i immediately downloaded it. however, once it was installed on my phone and i opened it, some weird things started happening!! the minute i tried to click on anything in the app i was met with a nightmare-inducing picture of a soggy cheeto screaming over and over about the “do-nothing democrats” and the “lamestream media.” i knew that this wasn’t my president (although he and the cheeto have some UNCANNY similarities 🤪.) however, as i tried to figure out why the app was glitching, i heard loud banging in the kitchen, i cautiously went to go check it out, holding my good luck charm, an absolutely RAVISHING photo of tucker carlson, in my hand (that man is a SNACC 🥵). as i enter the kitchen, i’m met with an absolutely SHOCKING SIGHT 😲!! right there, on my kitchen floor, lies donald trump in all his glory, bagging pots and pans together like a three year old!! i’m absolutely shocked at first, barely withholding squeals of finally seeing my idol 🥰. however as i look closer, i realize that what i’m looking at isn’t trump!! well, i guess it is, but he has horse ears and a long, swishy tail 😱!! he even has horse hooves in place of a tail!! i’m absolutely shocked, and in a state of panic i pick his now extremely heavy body up (although we all know we was already morbidly obese before 😈) and run to the church, because god can solve all my problems. there i’m met with the priest. “is that donald trump! omg! my idol!” he says. “wait... why does he have horse ears and a tail?! and he has hooves!!” he cries, astonished. “dang, i never thought he could pull it off so well, though 😏. i never though i’d relive my middle school furry phase 😻.” this makes me think. since all trump spies are in love with trump and trump is now a hybrid, does this make them all furries? not knowing what to do, i called fox news, (i’ve been writing them fan mail everyday for the past two years and they never respond 😡) but they pick up on the first ring. i explain my situation to them and they say that they have reporters nearby. about fifteen minutes later, their reporters come and start broadcasting this situation live to the world. “this must be the work of those nasty teens on tiktok,” one person says. “ or maybe those do-nothing democrats! i wouldn’t put it past them to be witches. i mean, they’re already all communists, and what’s the difference?” another very bright reporter with obviously a lot of knowledge about economic systems says. within the next few minutes, thousand of trump supporters come to see their president. they all look at horse hybrid trump and their expressions prove me right. all trump supporters ARE furries. they all’s tart to corner in on me, wanting to pet his ears, or run their fingers through his tail 😽. i back up into the the wall of the church. they have me cornered! i close my eyes as i feel them trample me. then, i take my last breath. anyways, my family buried me with my phone and who knew that my grave would have such great service? 10/10 would recommend 🥳! so i guess i’m writing this from my grave! anyways, the whole point of this reviews is that this app is incredibly dangerous and needs to be removed from the app store immediately‼️ learn form me and DON’T download it ❌❌. it cost me my life 😢.
